articles.author: Bhakti Makwana
articles.title: TCS tumbles and drags down to Wipro, Infosys, Tech Mahindra and LTTS with poor earnings - Business Insider India
articles.description: TCS was the biggest loser on Nifty 50 dragging the indices down with nearly 5% fall followed by other IT peers.Investors feared possible recession in the US
articles.content: A lot of stock market hopes were pinned on corporate earnings this year, and TCS in particular. And, its profits that grew a modest 5% with added cost pressures have dragged down its share price alon… [+2486 chars]
